briefTitle: Effectiveness of AI Genetic Counseling Program vs In-person Genetic Counseling in Breast Cancer
officialTitle: A Randomized Trial Comparing the Effectiveness of Pre-test Genetic Counseling Using an Artificial Intelligence Program and Traditional In-person Genetic Counseling in Women Newly Diagnosed With Breast Cancer Who do Not Currently Meet National Comprehensive Cancer Network (NCCN) Criteria for Genetic Testing.
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Percent of participants who took up genetic testing after not meeting NCCN guidelines for genetic testing
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Subjects diagnosed with Stage 0-3 breast cancer.
* Patients who do not satisfy current NCCN criteria for referral to a genetics counselor and genetics testing.
* Must have the ability to understand and the willingness to sign a written informed consent document as well as complete the study questionnaires.

Exclusion Criteria:

- N/A
